text: Garden State Youth Correctional Facility is a New Jersey Department of Corrections state prison that houses young adult offenders ages 18-30, located in the Crosswicks section of Chesterfield Township in Burlington County, New Jersey, United States. The facility opened in 1968 and has a maximum capacity of 1511 inmates. ==References== Category:1968 establishments in New Jersey Category:Chesterfield Township, New Jersey Category:Prisons in New Jersey Category:Buildings and structures in Burlington County, New Jersey
title: Garden State Youth Correctional Facility
